title.narrative: Fonds National REDD+ de la RDC -Programme d’Appui à la Société Civile

description.narrative: Ce programme contribue à la bonne gouvernance du programme REDD+ en Republique democratique du Congo

participating-org.narrative: MPTF- Cntrl African Forest Initiative fund (AFI00)

title.narrative: 0290/IC/FONAREDD/2017-Recrutement d?un(e) Consultant(e) National(e) Conseiller Adjoint à la Programmation au Secrétariat Exécutif

APPEL A PROPOSITIONS DE PROJETS POUR LA SELECTION DE PARTENAIRES LOCAUX D´EXECUTION (ONG/OSC) CHARGÉS DE LA MISE EN ?UVRE DES ACTIVITES DU PROGRAMME INTEGRE REDD+ /-ORIENTAL (PIREDD-O) DANS LES PROVINCES DU BAS-UELE, DE L?ITURI ET DE LA TSHOPO
Acquisition des sachets en polyéthylène et arrosoirs pour la mise en place des pépinières des cultures pérennes dans la Zone de PIREDD-O, en 3 lots indépendants
Appel à préqualification - APPROCHE 3 X 6, PHASE I & II
Appel à préqualification - APPROCHE 3 X 6, PHASE III
Expert(e) international(e) en appui au processus de la réforme de l?Aménagement du Territoire en République Démocratique du Congo ? Long Term Agreement
Recrutement d?un (01) Cabinet/Bureau d?étude chargé de la conception d?un système de Suivi et Evaluation spatial pour le Programme Intégré REDD+ Oriental (PIREDD-O) ? Composante CDM

Recrutement d?un cabinet ou d?une ONG pour réaliser le diagnostic des Services de l?Environnement, ATUH, du Foncier, de l?Agriculture et de l?administration des Chefferies/Secteurs de la province de l?Ituri

Recrutement d?un cabinet ou d?une ONG pour réaliser le diagnostic des Services de l?Environnement, ATUH, du Foncier, de l?Agriculture et de l?administration des Chefferies/Secteurs de la province de la Tshopo

Sélection des entreprises pour les travaux de construction et réhabilitation des bâtiments abritant les bureaux des chefferies, secteurs, affaires foncières et aménagement du territoire dans les provinces de l?Ituri, du Bas-Uele, et de la Tshopo

condition.narrative: Social and environmental sustainability will be enhanced through application of the UNDP Social and Environmental Standards (http://www.undp.org/ses) and related Accountability Mechanism (http://www.undp.org/secu-srm).
UNDP as the Implementing Partner will comply with the policies, procedures and practices of the United Nations Security Management System (UNSMS.)

description.narrative: The IRRF is UNDP’s results framework to monitor and report on its achievements against the Strategic Plan 2018-2021. UNDP publishes country level IRRF results that UNDP’s projects contributed to

Country has adopted and implemented, with UNDP assistance, legal and regulatory frameworks that enable civil society to function in the public sphere and contribute to sustainable development: Groups representing other marginalised populations

Country has adopted and implemented, with UNDP assistance, legal and regulatory frameworks that enable civil society to function in the public sphere and contribute to sustainable development: Whole of society

Country has adopted and implemented, with UNDP assistance, legal and regulatory frameworks that enable civil society to function in the public sphere and contribute to sustainable development: Women's groups

Country has adopted and implemented, with UNDP assistance, legal and regulatory frameworks that enable civil society to function in the public sphere and contribute to sustainable development: Youth groups
Country has adopted, with UNDP support, legal, policy and institutional reforms to remove structural barriers to women’s empowerment: Access to and control over assets and services

Country has adopted, with UNDP support, legal, policy and institutional reforms to remove structural barriers to women’s empowerment: Regulation of identity, tenancy rights, inheritance, marital status
Country has frameworks in place to prevent and respond to SGBV: Multi-sectoral policy and legislation
Country has frameworks in place to prevent and respond to SGBV: Multi-sectoral services including justice and security
Country has frameworks in place to prevent and respond to SGBV: Platforms for raising awareness and social mobilisation
Country has improved capacities for dialogue, consensus-building and reconciliation around contested issues, with equal participation of women and men

Country has national and local systems restored or adopted following crises: (Note: This indicator is reported on an annual basis, not cumulative. Please report expected and actual achievement for the reporting year only, excluding baseline values.) Functional justice systems

Country has national and local systems restored or adopted following crises: (Note: This indicator is reported on an annual basis, not cumulative. Please report expected and actual achievement for the reporting year only, excluding baseline values.) Victim redress mechanisms including transitional justice
Country has plans and strategies under implementation for the reintegration of displaced persons and/or former combatants
Country has public-private partnerships at national level to improve the enabling framework for economic diversification and green growth

Country has strengthened capacities for achieving energy transformation at scale: Growth in installed base of power generation from clean and/or renewable energy sources (If YES, please provide Number of installations)
Country has targets for low emission and climate-resilient development Budgets
Country has targets for low emission and climate-resilient development Development plans and strategies
Country has targets for low emission and climate-resilient development Private sector business plans and strategies

Only applies to crisis-affected countries: Country is supported by UNDP, upon request, with targeted interventions to strengthen core government functions for sustainable recovery and improved service delivery (Note: This indicator is reported on an annual basis, not cumulative. Please report expected and actual achievement for the reporting year only, excluding baseline values.)
Country has adopted, with UNDP support, legal, policy and institutional reforms to remove structural barriers to women’s empowerment: Discrimination in labour markets (formal and informal sectors)
Country has adopted, with UNDP support, legal, policy and institutional reforms to remove structural barriers to women’s empowerment: Others
Country has adopted, with UNDP support, legal, policy and institutional reforms to remove structural barriers to women’s empowerment: SGBV

Country has national and local systems restored or adopted following crises: (Note: This indicator is reported on an annual basis, not cumulative. Please report expected and actual achievement for the reporting year only, excluding baseline values.) Across a) – c) utilizing joint UN approaches to rebuilding rule of law and justice sector institutions and services

Country has national and local systems restored or adopted following crises: (Note: This indicator is reported on an annual basis, not cumulative. Please report expected and actual achievement for the reporting year only, excluding baseline values.) Community-oriented security services and oversight mechanisms

Number of people benefitting from jobs and improved livelihoods in crisis or post-crisis settings, disaggregated by sex and other characteristics (Note: This indicator is reported on an annual basis, not cumulative. Please report expected and actual achievement for the reporting year only, excluding baseline values.) Female
Natural resources that are managed under a sustainable use, conservation, access and benefit-sharing regime: Area of land under sustainable land management regime (hectares)

Number of people benefitting from jobs and improved livelihoods in crisis or post-crisis settings, disaggregated by sex and other characteristics (Note: This indicator is reported on an annual basis, not cumulative. Please report expected and actual achievement for the reporting year only, excluding baseline values.) Total
Natural resources that are managed under a sustainable use, conservation, access and benefit-sharing regime: Number of shared water ecosystems (fresh or marine) under cooperative management
Natural resources that are managed under a sustainable use, conservation, access and benefit-sharing regime: Area of existing protected area under improved management (hectares)
Proportion of GBV cases reported to authorities receiving judgment in the formal justice system Number of cases that received judgment
Proportion of GBV cases reported to authorities receiving judgment in the formal justice system Total number of GBV cases reported

Number of people benefitting from jobs and improved livelihoods in crisis or post-crisis settings, disaggregated by sex and other characteristics (Note: This indicator is reported on an annual basis, not cumulative. Please report expected and actual achievement for the reporting year only, excluding baseline values.) Male
Number and proportion of households benefitting from clean, affordable and sustainable energy access: Proportion total households with access
Natural resources that are managed under a sustainable use, conservation, access and benefit-sharing regime: Area under sustainable forest management (hectares)
Number and proportion of households benefitting from clean, affordable and sustainable energy access: Rural households with access
Number and proportion of households benefitting from clean, affordable and sustainable energy access: Rural households
Number and proportion of households benefitting from clean, affordable and sustainable energy access: Total households with access
Number and proportion of households benefitting from clean, affordable and sustainable energy access: Total households
